mapper.select: select a.article_id articleId, a.title, a.article_type articleType, a.summary, a.create_by createBy,a.create_time createTime, a.last_upd_by lastUpdBy, a.last_upd_time lastUpdTime from article a left join clicks c on a.article_id = c.article_id where a.article_type = #{articleType }
mapper.update: update subject set difficulty = #{difficulty}, time_limit = #{timeLimit}, memory_limit = #{memoryLimit}, other_limit = #{otherLimit} where article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select tag_id, count(article_id) articleNum from article_tags group by tag_id

select t.tag_id, count(at.article_id) articleNum from tag t, article_tags at where t.tag_type = #{tagType} and t.tag_id = at.tag_id
